column2:
"That was perfect...
70 kills doesn't look so hard any more."
"I had no idea you could fight like that. It really showed me how much I've been slackin' off on my training."
"Thanks to your help, I think I can just about scrape by and keep my job."
"Alright, today's the day I make a change for the better! It's time to start training for real! Thanks, pal!"
